meanings.definition: A person or thing that is notably superior or outstanding.
meanings.sent1: In the talent show, the singer was one of the standouts with her beautiful voice.
meanings.sent2: The standouts in the competition received medals for their exceptional skills.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy white cat was a standout among the other pets at the adoption event.
meanings.sent4: The bright red rose stood out in the garden like a standout in a sea of green leaves.
meanings.sent5: The student's perfect score on the test made him a standout in the class.

meanings.sent1: The actor's emotional monologue was a standout in the play.
meanings.sent2: Her impressive artwork was one of the standouts at the art exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The chef's unique dessert was a standout that left everyone wanting more.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's record-breaking jump was a standout moment in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The team's victory was a standout that will be remembered for years to come.
